comment.body:
@Alex-302 
The rule `||bilibili.com^$removeparam=mid` in commit [1ea2772 ](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/1ea2772c9c7dc5df85b49161f878542279016ee3) may cause failures when opening any `space.bilibili.com` pages.
At least the following two requests are affected:
- `https://api.bilibili.com/x/space/wbi/acc/info`
- `https://api.bilibili.com/x/space/setting`

comment.body:
> Спасибо за страничку, попробуйте добавить эти правила в пользовательские:
> 
> ```
> vk.com#$##react_rootCheckValidationPhone { display: none !important; }
> vk.com#$#body { position: static !important; }
> ```

По возможности помогите и мне  =) та же проблема, возможно обновили и этот фильтр не работает. (окно рабочее. но при этом полосы прокрутки нет)

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://chzzk.naver.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fchzzk.naver.com%2F) ### Comment > If you remove the pop-up ad like the picture number 1 > It looks like the pop-up ad has been removed as shown in picture 2. > But in reality, you can only choose the channel you see on the screen > Up and down screen movement is not possible. > > Also, if you go into any channel on the screen, watch the video, and come back to the main screen, the pop-up advertisement will appear again on the screen like picture 3. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ahhyrn20adk4ogwwsgoo0gg808gs0cwqcoeeg04su8.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/6o1pb2eexaosog4cs80gk8ggggoc0ccaqs7pwuxc0w.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 3 ![Screenshot 3](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/mcq5fh4au74ko0sw8cow0co4gwgcsws4n28rrts6om.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.18.1 (4778) System version: | Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.22631.0 Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns.adguard-dns.com/dns-query`

issue.title: www.sk7mobile.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.sk7mobile.com/main.do](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.sk7mobile.com%2Fmain.do) ### Comment > If you block it using the element blocking function, you can't scroll. The mobile app is also a web app, so if you break it here, it will be blocked there too. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ho8y1jh4jz4g0kkckss4ws0cgkgogw8fevmitqngfs.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.15.1.1731 release Browser: | Safari License type: | paid Tracking protection options: | Block Push API,
Block Location API,
Block Java,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Hide your Referrer from third-parties,
Hide your User-Agent,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Block trackers DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns.nextdns.io/xxxxxxx`
